RainbruRPG::Network::xmlPersoList

RainbruRPG::Network::xmlPersoList Class Reference

#include <xmlpersolist.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Provides an interface to the website-side character list.

It uses CurlFileToXml to et the character list and tinyxml to reading it.

Member Function Documentation

bool RainbruRPG::Network::xmlPersoList::refresh (  ) 

Refresh the xml document.

It calls loadDocument() to reload the xml file.

Returns:
false if the operation failed, otherwise true.

const char * RainbruRPG::Network::xmlPersoList::getXMLTextFromName ( TiXmlElement *  child,
const char *  nodeName 
) [private]

Returns the text element from the child and the given node name.

Parameters:
child The xml element where we must search the node.
nodeName The node's name we must find in child.
Returns:
The text store in the child's node defined by nodeName. Returns an empty string ("") if none child was found.
